content.raw: I've noticed that if I curl the fingers too far, the two outer joints on each finger will get stuck in the curled position -- even after the first joint uncurls successfully.  I've also occasionally noticed sometimes the first joint on the left index finger will get stuck at 0, while the outer 2 joints will start curling.  The index finger issue is intermittent, while the other I can easily reproduce.
content.html: I've noticed that if I curl the fingers too far, the two outer joints on each finger will get stuck in the curled position -- even after the first joint uncurls successfully. I've also occasionally noticed sometimes the first joint on the left index finger will get stuck at 0, while the outer 2 joints will start curling. The index finger issue is intermittent, while the other I can easily reproduce.
